description: You're destined for glory beyond the ken of ordinary adventurers and mere mortals.

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Great Fortitude, Iron Will, or Lightning Reflexes.

sections.text: You can use the surge ability once per day (adding 1d6). If you are or become mythic, you can use your surge one additional time per day.
sections.name: Benefits

name: Marked for Glory
